Description.Name: MG Ammo (Lightweight)
Description.Details: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Lightweight MG Ammo utilizes lightweight materials to improve ballistic properties, increasing maximum weapon range by 60 meters. This comes at the cost of 35% less damage damage output. Lightweight MG ammo bins contain 200 rounds of ammunition per ton. Ammunition type can be changed by clicking the middle of the weapons activation panel during combat if more than one type of ammunition is present. Explosion damage per ammo: 0.125
